purpose: Define immutable computational constraints and verification frequencies for canonical predictive models (MSB, VMO).

computational_complexity_limit.justification: Prevent unbounded complexity introduction during MASE updates to critical formulas.

runtime_drift_tolerance.justification: Mandatory testing of new/modified models against historical operational data; failure indicates structural divergence.

dependency_veto_rule.reason: All core predictive logic must be strictly deterministic and internal to the GCM scope.
